snippet: Tina Maze of Slovenia beat Mikaela Shiffrin in a World Cup slalom in Ofterschwang, Germany, to overtake her in the discipline standings.
abstract: Skier Tina Maze of Slovenia beats Mikaela Shiffrin in World Cup slalom in Ofterschwang, Germany, to overtake her in the discipline standings; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tina Maze of Slovenia beat Mikaela Shiffrin in a World Cup slalom in Ofterschwang, Germany, to overtake her in the discipline standings.

headline.seo: Tina Maze Takes Lead in World Cup Slalom
headline.main: Maze Takes Lead in World Cup Slalom Standings
